channel.title: Server Problem!
channel.description:
I'm Having trouble with my webclient - i made it at www.rswebclients.com
It's online but it says error connecting to server and i don't know how to resolve this. I hope Someone can help and the link to it is: www.rswebclients.com/play/chronicalswift
Thank you to whoever can help!

item.title: Server Problem!
item.dc:creator: @rova0 rova0
item.description:
@rova0 wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:1, topic:449387”]I’m Having trouble with my webclient - i made it at www.rswebclients.com

It’s online but it says error connecting to server and i don’t know how to resolve this. I hope Someone can help and the link to it is: www.rswebclients.com/play/chronicalswift

Thank you to whoever can help![/quote]

If you’re able to log in on the ‘download’ version of the client but not the webclient this could be because rswebclient’s client is incompatible with your source. (Or your server blocks 3rd party clients from connecting). The best solution is to make your own custom webclient which loads your own cache (instead of a generic, 1-for-all type client).

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problem!
item.dc:creator: @DevinCooley DevinCooley
item.description:
@DevinCooley wrote:

go to your source files and search for 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0
If you find any of those change them to your no-ip ip address. Compile, run your server, and then check it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problem!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“DevinCooley, post:2, topic:449387”]If the status checker says it is online that means you have done everything correct with portfowarding etc.
It says error connecting because you did not change the ip’s in your server to match the ones that you used to create the webclient.

Once you match the ip’s it should work.[/quote]

Where do i put the ip in my client?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problem!
item.dc:creator: @DevinCooley DevinCooley
item.description:
@DevinCooley wrote:

If the status checker says it is online that means you have done everything correct with portfowarding etc.
It says error connecting because you did not change the ip’s in your server to match the ones that you used to create the webclient.

Once you match the ip’s it should work.

Read full topic
